effects: Underground water sources within 1 mile of the lair are supernaturally fouled. A creature that drinks such water must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be diseased.
Surfaces within 1 mile of the lair become slimy and wet, making them difficult terrain.
The aboleth can project illusory images in pools of water within 1 mile of its lair, using them to communicate or deceive.
Creatures within 5 miles of the lair feel a vague psychic unease. Wisdom saving throws made within this area have a -2 penalty.
The elder brain is aware of any creature with an Intelligence of 4 or higher within 5 miles.
Telepathic communication within 5 miles can be intercepted by the elder brain.

naturalHazards.name: Faerzress
naturalHazards.description: Faerzress is a magical radiation unique to the Underdark. In areas of faerzress, spells that allow teleportation or planar travel have a 50% chance of failing. Divination spells have a 50% chance of producing false results.

naturalHazards.name: Unstable Caverns
naturalHazards.description: Cavern ceilings in the Underdark are prone to collapse, especially when disturbed by loud sounds or tremors. A collapse affects a 20-foot radius area; creatures must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 4d10 bludgeoning damage and be buried.

naturalHazards.name: Underground Rivers
naturalHazards.description: Fast-flowing underground rivers can sweep creatures away. A creature that enters the water must succeed on a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check to swim against the current. On a failure, the creature is swept 60 feet downstream per round and may be carried over waterfalls or into underwater passages.

naturalHazards.name: Bioluminescent Spores
naturalHazards.description: Certain fungi release clouds of spores when disturbed. Creatures in a 10-foot-radius cloud must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be illuminated with bioluminescent particles, shedding dim light in a 10-foot radius for 1d10 minutes. Creatures illuminated this way cannot benefit from invisibility and have disadvantage on Stealth checks.
